title: TrustStrategy Boosts Market Position with AI Investing Innovations for Smarter Portfolio Management
description: MIAMI, Oct. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TrustStrategy, a global leader in data-driven quantitative finance, has expanded AI investing capabilities with advanced algorithmic models to improve market adaptability and decision-making. This move cements the company’s commitment to integrating artificial intelligence into modern investment strategies-bridging the gap between retail investors and institutional-grade tech.

title: Young Aussie workers fear AI but use it to get ahead
description: Australia's Generation Z workers are concerned artificial intelligence could shrink their career opportunities but many are still using it.
content:
Almost three in four young Australian workers, particularly those employed in the finance sector, worry artificial intelligence technology will shrink their job prospects, a study has revealed.

title: Using AI in the diagnosis and treatment of mental disorders while protecting patient privacy
description: Mental disorders are among the leading causes of disability worldwide, with severe consequences for individuals, their families, and society at large. Detecting mental disorders typically requires resource-intensive clinical interviews conducted by specialists. In addition, there is a global shortage of trained therapists. In the early stages of a mental disorder, when interventions are most effective, artificial intelligence could significantly improve diagnosis and treatment.

title: French Army chief keen on Indian long-range weapons
description: France is keen on acquiring Indian long-range rockets, loitering munitions, and counter-drone systems following their performance in Operation Sindoor. The French Army chief expressed interest in co-developing capabilities in artificial intelligence and electronic warfare, highlighting the potential for enhanced joint training exercises.

title: California Enacts First US Law Requiring AI Chatbot Safety Measures
description: California governor Gavin Newsom on Monday signed into law a first-of-its-kind law regulating artificial intelligence chatbots, defying a push from the White House to leave such technology unchecked.

title: Gov. Newsom signs AI safety bill aimed at protecting children from chatbots
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Monday signed a bill into law that aims to make artificial-intelligence-powered chatbots safer despite some pushback from the tech industry. The legislation, Senate Bill 243, requires chatbot operators to have procedures to prevent the production of suicide or self-harm content and put in guardrails, such as referring users to a suicide hotline or crisis text ...
content:

title: GITEX 2025: Dubai Ruler Sheikh Mohammed inaugurates world’s largest tech and AI event
description: Middle East News: Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum inaugurates GITEX 2025, the world's biggest tech and AI event in Dubai, showcasing groundbreaking innovations and global tech showcases. The event reinforces UAE's position as a global digital leader and hub for cross-border collaboration in technology and artificial intelligence.
content: GITEX Global 2025, inaugurated by Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum in Dubai, marks its 45th edition with record-breaking global participation. Hosting over 6,800 companies and 2,000 startups, the event highlights the UAE’s push for AI-driven inn... [5823 chars]
